THE FUND FORADULT EDUCATION
April 8, 1954
RECEIVED
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
Mr. Harry J. Skornia
National Assoc, of Educational
Broadcasters
University of Illinois
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois /
Dear Mr. Skornia:
Enclosed is The Fund For Adult Education’s
check in the amount of $7,000, in favor of the
National Association of Educational Broadcasters,
in full payment of a grant to make possible the
establishment of a personnel service aimed at
serving the needs of the entire field of educational
television and radio. Terms and conditions of this
grant were set forth in Martha C. Howard’s letter
of March 26, 1954, to Mr. Graydon Ausmus.
Would you kindly acknowledge receipt of this
payment at your convenience.
Vernon K. Peet
Enclosure:
Check No. 0717
